detaileddescription.para: Before you start coding, you need to create and register your bot in the Discord developer portal.
To create a new application, take the steps as follows:

listitem.para: Sign in to the Discord developer portal and click on "New Application" on the top right.
Next, enter a name for the application in the pop-up and press the "Create" button.

detaileddescription.para: In this example we named it "D++ Test Bot".

listitem.para: Move on by click the "Bot" tab in the left-hand side of the screen. Now click the "Add Bot" button on the right and confirm that you want to add the bot to your application.

detaileddescription.para: On the resulting screen, youâ€™ll note a page with information regarding your new bot. You can edit your bot name, description, and avatar here if you want to.
In this panel, you can get your bot token. A bot token looks like this: OTAyOTMxODU1NTU1MzE3ODUw.YXlm0g.9oYCt-XHXVH_z9qAytzmVRzKWTg

simplesect.para: Don't share this token with anybody! If you ever somehow compromise your current bot token or see your bot in danger, you can regenerate the token in the panel.
